name: Internship in Clinical Psychology
description: This course introduces students to Clinical Psychology and related mental health fields. Students’ learning is facilitated through classroom-based activities and by learning about clinical research and/or practice in designated field settings. Students spend 3 hours per week in class and 6 hours per week in an applied or research setting. Please contact Dr. Beth Zimick if you are interested in enrolling at bethc@andrew.cmu.edu.
